TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void StartupNextInstanceEventHandler(object sender, StartupNextInstanceEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed StartupNextInstanceEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: A object that contains the event data.
Docs.summary: Represents the method that will handle the event.

remarks.format:
## Remarks In Visual Basic, you do not need to work with this delegate explicitly. For more information, see <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.StartupNextInstance>.
## Examples <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.StartupNextInstance?displayProperty=fullName>
